snippet.title: Bayonetta 2 for Nintendo Switch Trailer - The Game Awards 2017
snippet.description:
Bayonetta comes to Nintendo Switch! Take this butt-kicking, havoc-wreaking witch with you anytime and anywhere! Bayonetta and Bayonetta 2 for Nintendo Switch are available Feb. 16th, 2018!

#NintendoSwitch #TheGameAwards2017 #Bayonetta #Bayonetta2

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
